name: AIR FILTERS
description: Best equipment to trap dirt and debris and keep them away from harming the engine of the car.

name: BRAKE DISC
description: The rotating part of a wheel's disc brake assembly, against which the brake pads are applied.

name: CAR ACCUMULATOR
description: It provides compressor protection, preventing compressor failure dur to liquid slugging.

name: CONDITIONER
description: It allows the car to cool the interior air of the vehicle, providing a cooler environment.

name: COOLERS
description: It is an automobile window-mounted evaporative air cooler, referred to as a swamp cooler.

name: COUPLING PART
description: Mechanical element part that connects two shafts together to accurately transmit the power.

name: GENERATOR
description: It utilizes a car's alternator to supply power to external appliances like a home furnace, refrigerator.

name: MOTOR OIL
description: One of various substances used for the lubrication of internal combustion engines.

name: OIL FILTER
description: It isncased in a small capsule with various components inside that are used to filter out contaminants within the oil.

name: SPARKS
description: These are simple [lugs that creates an explosion which makes your engine produce power.

name: WHEEL RIM
description: It is the metal part that is the outer edge of a wheel which holds the tire.
